name: The Dahlia Chest
description: Nothing quite completes a bedroom arrangement like a pair of elegant bedside tables. Providing the perfect framing for the bed centrepiece, a pair of Dahlia Bedside Tables can bring unity and harmony to your room scheme, not to mention offering practical storage space. While the Dahlia has been designed as a bedside table, there is no reason why it could not serve equally well as a small side table in a living space or study. A refined elegance born of restraint is evident in the design of the Dahlia, with its pristine box form and rectangular. Such a shape is satisfyingly robust and, despite its uncomplex geometry, creates serious impact. A single cabinet with a push-latch door provides versatile storage for bedroom essentials; the perfect space to hide away clutter, such as phone chargers and magazines. All DAVIDSON designs are available in a finish of your choosing. Our  team would be delighted to discuss options and help you to decide which of our finishes would suit your look.
